recipesJson.name: Kringle's Curse Remix
recipesJson.author: XxBulldogIrishxX
recipesJson.description: Was looking to make a pretty spot on Kringles Curse vape and I feel like this is very close...it's cold cold cold and very sweet..You can cut back on the sweetener obviously but the original is very sweet like a candy cane so that's what I went with...if you mix it up let me know what ya think...I'm sure cool menthol can be subbed with Like (Fa) Arctic Winter or something that's cold at a higher percentage but (Flv) Cool Menthol is my go to with menthols as it's the best hands down and you can use less of it. I used (Tpa) Sweetener because I was waiting on (Cap) Super Sweet to come in the mail so feel free to use that instead at 0.75 or 1

reviews.text: I really like this when I got the ol' vaper's tongue. Have to say, never had the original, but you can't get wrong with this. I left the sweetener out, but on my next mix of this I try it with some. Also Subbed the FLV Cool Menthol for Smoking Bull Kristall, but I think most decent menthol flavors will work here. Recommended!
